author: @Emperor.Penguin.
text:
I woke up early today and was able to catch this live. Near the end you mentioned how a lot of internet leftists like to describe themselves as several different kind of "-ist's" like Marxist-Maoist-Titoist-etc.

I remember when I was a younger man and learning more about leftist ideologies I was very confused by people describing themselves as several peoples last names.

I also want to thank you for mentioning how a lot of younger Americans who are getting into more leftist politics don't understand how "indoctrinated" they are through years of subconsciously listening to US propaganda

author: @DREWMORA_03
text: Eddie can you please make a video on pedro castillo, I think he has some good economic policies but I'm concerned of the extreme conservatism and some of his policies regarding glorification of the military.I come from South America and hate that among the leftwing movements, the military is not seen as a tool to defend the people but as a body to be glorified and romanticized.I don't want my continent to be a military and conservative hellhole and I think Pedro Castillo would just make this issue worse.
